"Dash Panels":
"Press the<%Access> to access the dash panels.
This will allow you to dash for a limited time."

"While dashing, every time you touch another dash panel's ring,
you can dash for longer periods of time.
(Re-accessing the dash panels won't be neccessary if you touch each dash panel's ring while you're dashing.ï¼‰

(Peformable actions while dashing)
Press<%Jump>to jump.
Press<%NormalAttack>/<%PhotonArts>to kick.

The attack power of your kick
can be enhanced up to a maximum of 3 stages by touching more dash panel rings.

By skillfully going through the dash panel rings, you can quickly reach
the destination, and reach the fight immidiately."
